ch.zhaw.paraglider.physics

Class Glider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.paraglider.physics.Glider

  • public class Glider
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class represents the Glider, which contains two Wings and a Pilot.
    Author:
    Christian Brüesch / Jonas Gschwend

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Glider getInstance()
        Returns the Instance of the Glider.
        Returns:
        Glider

      • getPitchAngle

        public double getPitchAngle()
        Returns the current PitchAngle of the Glider. The Pitch Angle is the angle of the x -axis in relationship to the ground.
        Returns:
        double in Radian

      • getRollAngle

        public double getRollAngle()
        Returns the current Roll Angle of the Glider. The Roll Angle is the angle of the y - axis in relationship to the ground.
        Returns:
        double in Radian

      • getHorizontalSpeed

        public double getHorizontalSpeed()
        Returns the current Speed in relationship to the ground.
        Returns:
        double in meter per secound.

      • getVerticalSpeed

        public double getVerticalSpeed()
        Returns the current vertical Speed in relationship to the ground. The positive speed direction is to the ground.
        Returns:
        double in meter per second.

      • getCurrentGlideRatio

        public double getCurrentGlideRatio()
        Returns the current glide Ratio.
        Returns:
        double

      • changeSpeed

        public void changeSpeed(double msLeft,
               double msRight)
        Changes the speed of the Glider.
        Parameters:
        msLeft - double in meter per seconds
        msRight - double in meter per seconds

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets all variables to the same values as it was at the start.
